name: Claude Code CLI
description: Isolde: Installs Anthropic Claude Code CLI for AI-assisted development with multi-provider support

version.description: Claude Code version: 'latest' (default, auto-updates enabled), 'stable', or specific version like '1.2.41' (auto-updates disabled)

provider.description: LLM provider name (e.g., 'z.ai', 'anthropic'). Reads auth/base_url from ~/.claude/providers/{provider}/. Empty = use Anthropic defaults

models.description: Claude models as comma-separated values: haiku:model,sonnet:model,opus:model

http_proxy.description: HTTP proxy for build-time downloads only (e.g., 'http://proxy.example.com:8080'). Runtime proxy is read from shared state file.

https_proxy.description: HTTPS proxy for build-time downloads only (e.g., 'http://proxy.example.com:8080'). Runtime proxy is read from shared state file.
